EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Call Follow Up (1343166603.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Call Follow Up (1343166603.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Marty, You are not annoying me at all – this is my job and it is my pleasure to help! I have attached the update estimate, please let me know if you would like to see any additional estimates (these are very easy for me to create.) Thanks!Sara From: Martin Bradley [mailto:marty916@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 24, 2012 10:55 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Hi Sara,
The contract with the original client through Eliassen died down but it looks like they have a new contract longer length, lower rate. Anyway, Is it possible for you to share the spreadsheet that you used to do the Net Cash that you did for me in this thread? Or is this online?
Anyway, I think I'm looking at a rate of $100/hr I'm just trying to see if I can swing that.
Thanks for any help.
By the way, let me know if I'm annoying you... I swear one of these will hit soon.
MartyOn Fri, Apr 27, 2012 at 12:04 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Marty , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLoV4vuqq5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> I have also attached your net cash estimate, please give me a call to reivew it. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLoV4vuqq5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLoV4vuqq5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLoV4vuqq5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLoV4vuqq5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLoV4vuqq5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
